author: abcoathup
content:
<@543900561460822016> seeing quite a bit of crypto recovery spam on Eth Magicians that I keep flagging.  
I check the forum most weekdays if you need an extra mod to remove spam.

author: etan_status
content: There seems to be a bug in eip-review-bot where modifying files inside `assets` folder triggers `e-consensus` label, and doesn't include any other labels (e.g., EIP related ones). Notably, `e-review` label is missing and the typical bot approvals don't work. e.g. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7936
